description:
React hook that provides all the state management logic
for a group of checkboxes.

It is consumed by the `CheckboxGroup` component

value.description: The value of the checkbox group
value.name: value

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the checkbox group
defaultValue.name: defaultValue

onChange.description: The callback fired when any children Checkbox is checked or unchecked
onChange.name: onChange

isDisabled.description: If `true`, all wrapped checkbox inputs will be disabled
isDisabled.name: isDisabled

isNative.description:
If `true`, input elements will receive
`checked` attribute instead of `isChecked`.

This assumes, you're using native radio inputs
isNative.name: isNative
